projects.name: Eureka
projects.summary: AI-powered query interface that allows users to efficiently access and understand client data stored in internal databases using a user-friendly chat interface.

projects.name: ZenFren
projects.summary: ZenFren is an AI-powered chatbot that provides personalized mental health support to students.

projects.name: GitGraph Backend
projects.summary: Backend for GitGraph: Parses Python code to generate ASTs and construct functional dependency graphs.

projects.name: Eth QF
projects.summary: A decentralized Quadratic Crowdfunding Platform built on the Ethereum blockchain.

projects.name: NaturalShell
projects.summary: An AI-powered tool that converts natural language into shell commands, complete with explanations and editable suggestions.

projects.name: cmdX
projects.summary: A CLI tool that transforms natural language instructions into executable Linux shell commands.

projects.name: PixArt
projects.summary: A Golang-based desktop GUI application for creating and saving pixel art, built using the Fyne toolkit.
